beer.beer_description:
Avast, ye mateys!

No need fer battin' down the hatches or pullin' up the Jolly Roger. There be no wild waves or cause fer pullin' out yer cutlasses. 'tis fer lack of caution that this here brig be scuttlin' under our very feet.

Bleedin' scumbag stowaway from Sunstone Alehouse found his damned self playin' with flame round our powder kegs, three sheets to the wind cause of our Captain’s special brew.

Fetch the scurvy-ridden scallywag and make him dance the hempen jig by the mast! And get yer last jug of now smokey precious porter to have yer last giggle with yer fellow seadogs just before turnin’ all into sharkbait.

If it be not to your likin', well... dead men tell no tales.

If it be not to your likin', well... dead men tell no tales.

items.badge_description: What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 5 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 30 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 7!

items.badge_description: Happy Halloween! We hope you enjoy some of your spookiest brews on this haunted evening.

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 10 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 40 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more Level 9!

items.badge_description: Another year of drinking socially down. Thank you for continuing to discover new beer, venues, and of course checking in. Cheers to seven years!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink a new beer on three Thursdays in a 30 day period! Find out how New Brew Thursday was started, and catch up on old episodes.

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 65 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 14!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 15 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more Level 4!

user.bio:
》Craft beer enthusiast
》Mikkellers beer addicted
》Sour beers lover
The best is not perfect, the rest is not worth it.

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 205 check-ins with a photo.

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 10 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 3!
Take a whiff and enjoy that smooth, smoky aroma while you down the whole pint. That's 5 different Smoked beers. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 15 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 4!

user.bio:
》Craft beer enthusiast
》Mikkellers beer addicted
》Sour beers lover

beer.beer_description:
Avast, ye mateys!

No need fer battin' down the hatches or pullin' up the Jolly Roger. There be no wild waves or cause fer pullin' out yer cutlasses. 'tis fer lack of caution that this here brig be scuttlin' under our very feet.

Bleedin' scumbag stowaway from Sunstone Alehouse found his damned self playin' with flame round our powder kegs, three sheets to the wind cause of our Captain’s special brew.

Fetch the scurvy-ridden scallywag and make him dance the hempen jig by the mast! And get yer last jug of now smokey precious porter to have yer last giggle with yer fellow seadogs just before turnin’ all into sharkbait.

If it be not to your likin', well... dead men tell no tales.

items.badge_description: Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 65 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 14!

beer.beer_name: Vanilla-Chipotle Puff, Puff, Glass Imperial Smoked Porter
